Main - package Main
 
Main - Class in Main
 
Main() - Constructor for class Main.Main
 
MESSAGE - Enum constant in enum Model.Cards.DeckType
 
MessageCard - Class in Model.Cards
Implements the Card Interface and it contains all the data needed for a MessageCard and the methods to access and transform the data
MessageCard(String[], int) - Constructor for class Model.Cards.MessageCard
constructor: Constructs a new MessageCard with the given parameter info and cardNumber
Precondition: info is not null and contains all the necessary data for the card and cardNumber is between 0 and 47
postcondition: Creates and initializes a MessageCard with the given info (which is a String[] with the Title, type, value, imagePath, message and 1 choice of the card) and cardNumber (the number of the order of the card on the board).
MessageTile - Class in Model.Tiles
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round, and there is an extra member that holds how many message cards should be opened
MessageTile(int) - Constructor for class Model.Tiles.MessageTile
constructor: Constructs a new MessageTile with the given parameter orderNumber, imagePath and numberOfMessageCards
postcondition: Creates and initializes a MessageTile with the given orderNumber, imagePath and numberOfMessageCards
Model - package Model
 
Model.Cards - package Model.Cards
 
Model.Tiles - package Model.Tiles
 
movePawnToTile(Pawn, Tile) - Method in class View.GraphicUI
Transformer: Moves one of the pawns to a new tile
Precondition: The pawn and the tile must not be null
Postcondition: The pawn has been moved
movePlayerToDealerBuyer(Player) - Method in class Controller.Controller
Transformer: The player is moved to the nearest dealer or buyer tile, and the gui is called to move the pawn
postcondition: The has been moved to the nearest dealer or buyer tile, and the position of the pawn in the gui board has changed accordingly
